SAMRAI::tbox::AsyncCommStage::Handler

SAMRAI::tbox::AsyncCommStage::Handler Struct Reference

Optional object that can be attached to each Member, for use in determining what to do after the Member completes its communication. More...

Public Member Functions

virtual ~Handler ()

Detailed Description

Optional object that can be attached to each Member, for use in determining what to do after the Member completes its communication.

This class is empty because it serves only to be subclassed.

See also:
Member::setHandler().
